Song.title: Jesus, Thank You
Song.copyright: Words and Music by Pat Sczebel © 2003 Integrity’s Hosanna! Music (ASCAP)/Sovereign Grace Worship (ASCAP).

Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: The m[Em7]ystery of the cr[C2]oss I cannot c[G/B]ompreh[D2]end The [C2]agonies of C[G/B]alvar[Dsus]y [ | D ] [Em7]You the perfect [C2]holy One [G/B]crushed Your [D2]Son Who d[Am7]rank the bitter [G/B]cup reserved for [Dsus]me [| D ]
CHORUS: Your b[G]lood has w[D2]ashed away my [Em7]sin Jesus, th[C2]ank You The F[G]ather’s wrath compl[D2]etely satisf[Em7]ied Jesus, th[C2]ank You [Em7]Once Your ene[D/F#]my now s[G]eated at Your [C2]table Jesus, t[Dsus]hank Y[D]ou [| G/B] [| C2 | Dsus D | D | G/B | C2 | Dsus | D ]
VERSE 2: [Em7]By Your perfect s[C2]acrifice I’ve b[G/B]een brought n[D2 ]ear Your [C2]enemy You’ve [G/B]made Your fr[Dsus]iend [| D ] [Em7]Pouring out the r[C2]iches of Your g[G/B]lorious gr[D2]ace Your m[Am7]ercy and Your k[G/B]indness know no [Dsus D | D ]end
BRIDGE: L[Em7]over [D/F#]of my [G]soul, [C2]I want to [G/B]live [D2]for [C2]You [|][C2](repeat)
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 the mystery of the cross i cannot comprehend the agonies of calvary you the perfect holy one crushed your son who drank the bitter cup reserved for me chorus your blood has washed away my sin jesus thank you the fathers wrath completely satisfied jesus thank you once your enemy now seated at your table jesus thank you verse 2 by your perfect sacrifice ive been brought near your enemy youve made your friend pouring out the riches of your glorious grace your mercy and your kindness know no end bridge lover of my soul i want to live for you repeat

VERSE 2: [Em7]By Your perfect s[C2]acrifice I’ve b[G/B]een brought n[D2 ]ear Your [C2]enemy You’ve [G/B]made Your fr[Dsus]iend [| D ] [Em7]Pouring out the r[C2]iches of Your g[G/B]lorious gr[D2]ace Your m[Am7]ercy and Your k[G/B]indness know no [Dsus D | D ]end

{key:A} CHORUS: Your b[A]lood has w[E2]ashed away my [F#m7]sin Jesus, th[D2]ank You The F[A]ather’s wrath compl[E2]etely satisf[F#m7]ied Jesus, th[D2]ank You [F#m7]Once Your ene[E/G#]my now s[A]eated at Your [D2]table Jesus, t[Esus]hank Y[E]ou [| A/C#] [| D2 | Esus E | E | A/C# | D2 | Esus | E ]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 the mystery of the cross i cannot comprehend the agonies of calvary you the perfect holy one crushed your son who drank the bitter cup reserved for me chorus your blood has washed away my sin jesus thank you the fathers wrath completely satisfied jesus thank you once your enemy now seated at your table jesus thank you verse 2 by your perfect sacrifice ive been brought near your enemy youve made your friend pouring out the riches of your glorious grace your mercy and your kindness know no end bridge lover of my soul i want to live for you repeat chorus your blood has washed away my sin jesus thank you the fathers wrath completely satisfied jesus thank you once your enemy now seated at your table jesus thank you
